comp2541.coursework2

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp2541.coursework2.Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Card>

    public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Card>
    Simple representation of a playing card.

    Provided for use in COMP2541 Coursework 2.

    Author:
    Nick Efford
